article_title: WaPo's Philip Bump Faces Twitter Backlash for Not Knowing GOP Controls Michigan

article_summary:
— Guerilla Mindfulness (@Miaisms) December 30, 2014@pbump must suck MI run by gop huh?
— Dmac (@conserv_voice) December 30, 2014@pbump Boy, Brietbart tore you a new one.
Have you looked up who run MI yet?
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTERThe Washington Post‘s Philip Bump learned the hard way what happens when one assumes something and posts it on social media.
Bump was the recipient of a few tweets as a result of his ignorance:@pbump is such a blogger… http://t.co/p5db8wvFCE — Seamus Bruner (@seamussss) December 30, 2014@pbump <— Lacks awareness.
